name: Super Cock Fight
description:
This is a 2 play dual game where you play as space birds and fight to not be served at the dinner table.

Multiple input devices are required, controller + keyboard is the most common combination. But the game is intended to be played with a controller. 

If your having trouble with the webplayer, i have included a downloadable zip file.

Special Controls:

  • Dash/Punch: Shift, B
  • Throw: Ctrl, right trigger
  • Aim Controller only: Right stick

Super Ultra Cock Fight was created during a 40-hour Game Jam with the theme "Throwing Portals".

Credits: 

  • Programming: Tarek Auf der Strasse
  • Graphics: Maja Lindahl
  • Music: Oliver Nordblom
  • Sounds: Kenny

After the game restarts the music duplicates, to fix this just reload the game. This will be fixed in the next update.
